Experiences.name: J. Craig Venter Institute
Experiences.summary: Development of automated diagnosis pipeline to improve the accuracy of leukemia diagnostics by changing the currently adopted subjective and labor-intensive manual gating approach relying on flow cytometry data.

projects.name: Quantum Computing
projects.summary: Quantum computing is the use of quantum-mechanical phenomena such as superposition and entanglement to perform computation. Computers that perform quantum computations are known as quantum computers.
